import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../styles.module.css' const Ajoutersujet = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({}) const handleChange = (event: any) => { const titre = event.target.titre const value = event.target.value setInputs((values) => ({ ...values, [titre]: value })) } const handleSubmit = (event: any) => { event.preventDefault() alert(inputs) } return (
